tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When traveling in China, I got severe toothache and couldn‚Äôt find any English speaking dentist there. I called Dr. Amit Baranwal and he guided me on the medicine to take, which gave great relief. On coming back I immediately went to see him, and he diagnosed need for a root canal. The first visit cleaning was completely painless, and removed the persistent pain completely as well. I went for the root canal 3 days later, and he did it so smoothly and quickly that I was pleasantly surprised. It has been 2 weeks since then and my problem seems completely fixed. Great experience. And very cost effective.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to dr Amit Baranwal for replacement of my removable denture which over a period of time had become very loose. I was suggested to opt for complete  fixed denture with the  help of implants.

He did 6 implants in my lower jaw and fixed my teeth on them.  I was very comfortable from  the day 1 with them. Though  there was some pain and swelling initially but it gradually subsided and it was explained me before the surgery. Now  after 4 months I have got my final fixed denture which are even more comfortable.

Overall I would say it's a long treatment and many visits involved but it's worth it. 
I would definitely recommend him for dental implants. Thanks Dr Amit Baranwal you have gifted hands
